json.text: This is Harrow. The monastic, the ritualist.
Dedicated to the Void, he harnesses its awesome power.
Condemn brings forth a wave of energy that chains enemies in place
Penance sacrifices shields, providing health regeneration
based on a percentage of damage dealt by Harrow
while also increasing his fire and reload rates.
Thurible provides bursts of energy to Harrow and allies within range
every time he gets a kill, amplified more-so for headshots.
The longer it is active, the higher the energy given.
Covenant protects allies within range from all damage and status effects for a short period.
Once ended, all protected allies gain additional critical chance
relative to the amount of damage absorbed.
Harrow is Suffragan to the Void, will you believe, Tenno?
